keyMoments.title: Execution Trial in Arena
keyMoments.description: The Kuja Pirates and warriors gather in the arena to witness the trial and execution of Luffy for invading Amazon Lily.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Kuja's strict enforcement of their laws and their cultural practices around justice and execution.

keyMoments.title: Gorgon Sisters' Power Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Kuja warriors witness the Gorgon Sisters' Devil Fruit transformations as they prepare to personally execute Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's leadership possesses powerful Devil Fruit abilities and reinforces their fearsome reputation.

affiliations.description: Boa Hancock is a Warlord of the Sea, giving the Kuja Pirates protection under the World Government.
